item.description:
Ok -- I've taken the leap and decided to start a Boston World Music Meetup as a regular event. Our first Meetup is Thursday, July 26, 7:30PM at Ryles Jazz Club. Samba Tremeterra (Brazilian batucada) is performing starting at 9pm. Ryles has a 'World Music Night' every Wednesday so this may be a good place to meet each month -- we can pick a show to go to a month in advance.

Samba Tremeterra is lead by Deraldo Ferreira -- who is also my samba dance instructor at the dance complex. This will be great dance music for later on in the evening. The cost of staying for Samba Tremeterra's performance is $10.

Since we are just starting up please RSVP and bring some friends!
item.name: Samba Tremeterra at Ryles, Thursday, July 26
